mean_cn: v. 减轻，低估，为…找借口，使人原谅
mean_en: lessen or to try to lessen the seriousness or extent of
word_etyma: ex出+tenu细+ate使...→把重罪弄细薄出来→减轻罪行
short_phrase: extenuate one's environmental impact by recycling
sentence: I want to extenuate my impact on the environment by recycling.
sentence_trans: 我希望通过回收利用来减轻我对环境的影响。
